title: 21｜元组：如何处理一次性数据？
content:
课后习题
请你创建元组，元组中包含三个元素，分别为'x'、'y'、'z'。请为该元组执行增加元素和删除元素操作，执行访问第四个元素索引操作，执行后请分别观察出错信息，并区分不同错误产生的不同提示信息内容。

课程代码、课件及其他相关资料地址
https://gitee.com/wilsonyin/zero-basics-python

replies.content:
塌破 ，我再练习几遍

del 准确来说是删除 变量名和 tuple对象之间的联系， 一旦tuple对象没有变量继续引用它了，tuple对象会等待Python解释器释放，释放以后才能进入到内存回收

comments.comment_content:
执行del删除tuple，是不是为了回收内存？
另，tuple的发音应该是“塌破”[tʌpl]吧？

discussion.discussion_content:
塌破 ，我再练习几遍

del 准确来说是删除 变量名和 tuple对象之间的联系， 一旦tuple对象没有变量继续引用它了，tuple对象会等待Python解释器释放，释放以后才能进入到内存回收

comments.comment_content:
1、增加元素 报错
tuple_demo = ('x', 'y', 'z')
print(tuple_demo.append('a'))
AttributeError: 'tuple' object has no attribute 'append'

2、删除元素 报错
tuple_demo = ('x', 'y', 'z')
print(tuple_demo.remove('z'))
AttributeError: 'tuple' object has no attribute 'remove'

3、元素索引操作
tuple_demo = ('x', 'y', 'z')
print(tuple_demo.insert(3, 'a'))
AttributeError: 'tuple' object has no attribute 'insert'

索引：
tuple_demo = ('x', 'y', 'z')
for i in range(len(tuple_demo) + 1):
    print(tuple_demo[i])

tuple = ('x','y','z')
tuple.append('w')
print(tuple)
AttributeError: 'tuple' object has no attribute 'append'
-----------------------------------------------------------
print(tuple.remove('x'))
AttributeError: 'tuple' object has no attribute 'remove'
-----------------------------------------------------------
print(tuple[4])
IndexError: tuple index out of range

# 元祖属于不可变序列
# 元祖支持不可变序列的全部内置操作
# 注意区分元祖和列表，按需使用每种数据类型

meta_group = ('x', 'y', 'z')
print(meta_group)
meta_group.insert(1) # AttributeError: 'tuple' object has no attribute 'insert'
meta_group.remove('x') # AttributeError: 'tuple' object has no attribute 'remove'
meta_group[3] # IndexError: tuple index out of range

tuple_alpha = ('x', 'y', 'z')
# 增加元素
tuple_alpha.append('a') # AttributeError: 'tuple' object has no attribute 'append'

# 删除元素
tuple_alpha.remove() # AttributeError: 'tuple' object has no attribute 'remove'

# 访问第四个元素索引
tuple_alpha[3] # IndexError: tuple index out of range

前两个操作，告诉我们 tuple上没有这两个方法（attribute 属性）
最后的操作，告诉我们 索引值超出了tuple的范围

num = ('x','y','z')
#num1 = [x for x in num]
num1 = list(num)
print(num)
print(num1)
num1.append('a')
print(num1)
num = tuple(num1)
print(num)
print(num[3])

1、#元组增加元素
tuple = ("x","y","z")
tuple.append("c")

执行后提示：AttributeError: 'tuple' object has no attribute 'append'

2、#元组删除元素
tuple = ("x","y","z")
#tuple.remove("x")

执行后提示：AttributeError: 'tuple' object has no attribute 'remove'

3、#在索引位置插入元素
tuple = ("x","y","z")
tuple.insert(3,"c")

执行后提示：AttributeError: 'tuple' object has no attribute 'insert'

tuple_demo = tuple(list('xyz'))
print(tuple_demo)

list_convert = list(tuple_demo)
print(list_convert)

list_convert.append('a')
print(list_convert)

list_convert.pop(0)
print(list_convert)

tuple_demo = tuple(list_convert)
print(tuple_demo)

tuple_demo.append('a')

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

list_demo = [1,2,3]
tuple_demo = tuple(list_demo)
print(list_demo)
print(type(list_demo))
print(tuple_demo)
print(type(tuple_demo))

yuan = ('x', 'y', 'z')
list1 = list(yuan)
list1.insert(0, "w")
del list1[-1]
yuan = tuple(list1)
print(yuan)

"""尝试对元祖进行增加，删除，访问不存在的元素，观测错误信息"""

tuple1 = ('x', 'y', 'z')

tuple1[1] = 'z'    #TypeError: 'tuple' object does not support item assignment
print(tuple1[3])   #IndexError: tuple index out of range
